description: WGD was associated with adverse survival pan-cancer in patients with advanced disease and in cancers with heterogeneous clinical outcomes, even following the development of metastasis.
citation: Bielski CM, Zehir A, Penson AV, et al. Genome doubling shapes the evolution and prognosis of advanced cancers Nat Genet. 2018; 50(8):1189-1195.
